pros: Super bouncy; Cushy feel for miles; Breathable; Light AF; Ready for cornering; Locks you in; Tongue stays in place; Mad durable; Sets the bar for a do-it-all shoe
cons: For narrow-to-medium feet only; Stack heights higher than advertised
RR_verdict: Putting the Novablast 3 on immediately felt like setting a brand-new standard for a daily trainer! We found it to be an exceptionally comfortable daily running shoe that can go fast and can go far. What's more, we felt as if we could even race in it in our next marathon too. Talk about versatility! And if you just want a light shoe that won't drag you down, the ASICS Novablast 3 is the all-rounder you need.
awards: Top pick in best running shoes for orthotics (2023), Top 9% in road running shoes, Top 21% in ASICS running shoes
